subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Orlando Magic guard Mickael Pietrus will be out three to five weeks because of a torn ligament in his right thumb. Pietrus, who averages nearly 13 points, hurt his thumb against Philadelphia last week. The Magic are already missing the backup guard Keith Bogans because of a broken thumb, and the starting point guard Jameer Nelson is nursing a pulled groin.
